show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #22 Sean Smith, A Robot Milking Grazing Dairy in Canada
subtitle: #22 Sean Smith, A Robot Milking Grazing Dairy in Canada
summary:
This week we head up north into Canada and visit with Sean Smith from Clanman Jerseys about how different the Dairy Industry is up there and how they have transitioned to a Grass based dairy that milks with a Robot!


https://www.facebook.com/ClanmanJerseys
